mapper.select: SELECT b.member_id, b.gender, b.nickname, b.birth_date, b.introduction, b.manner_temperature, b.profile_image_url, c.status_id FROM meeting_participation_history a JOIN member b ON a.member_id = b.member_id JOIN user c ON b.member_id = c.user_id WHERE meeting_id = #{ meetingId } AND a.status_id = 2 AND c.status_id != 4
